body_html:
@ebrevdo I'm not an engineer, but it doesn't seem to make a lot of sense to attempt to recreate an error from a nightly. For reproducibility, I think one would attempt to reconstruct the error from a stable version.

But if I were to build from a nightly, which nightly would I use?
body_text:

body:
@ebrevdo I'm not an engineer, but it doesn't seem to make a lot of sense to attempt to recreate an error from a nightly. For reproducibility, I think one would attempt to reconstruct the error from a stable version.

But if I were to build from a nightly, which nightly would I use?
